Name: Golden Reign
Ingredients: 50 ml Light gold rum (1-3 year old molasses column)
15 ml Grand Marnier or other cognac orange liqueur
7.5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Martini glass .
Prepare garnish of orange zest twist.
EXPRESS orange zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: A lightly creamy, after dinner drink.
History: Adapted from a drink created in 2002 by Peter Dorelli at The American Bar at The Savoy Hotel, London, England to celebrate the Queen's golden jubilee.
Nutrition: One serving of Golden Reign contains 280 calories
